questions.question: 10 volt source is connected in series with resistor 20 ohm and 30 ohm. What will be the voltage across the resistor 30 ohm?

explanations.a: Incorrect. 10V is the total source voltage.
explanations.b: Incorrect. 8V would require different resistor values.

questions.question: 6 volt zener diode is connected across the power source of 10 volt with series resistance 1k ohm. What will be the current through the series resistance?
